Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog
  • public class CourseCatalog
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses the Course class and the CourseRecordIO class to create and edit course catalogs and access their information
    Author:
    tadeotheis

      • loadCoursesFromFile

        public void loadCoursesFromFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads courses into the course catalog from an input file
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file with courses.

      • addCourseToCatalog

        public boolean addCourseToCatalog​(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String section,
                                  int credits,
                                  java.lang.String instructorId,
                                  int enrollmentCap,
                                  java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        Loops through the course catalog and checks if the given course is a duplicate of an existing course in the catalog. If it is not in the catalog it adds the course and returns true, returns false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the course
        title - title of the course
        section - section of the course
        credits - credits of the course
        instructorId - courses instructor ID
        enrollmentCap - the max number of students allowed to enroll
        meetingDays - courses meeting days
        startTime - courses start time
        endTime - courses end time
        Returns:
        true if the course was added to catalog, false otherwise.

      • removeCourseFromCatalog

        public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog​(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String section)
        Loops through the course catalog and removes a course if it exists in the catalog. Returns true if the course is found and removed, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the course
        section - section of the course
        Returns:
        true if the course is found and removed, false otherwise.

      • getCourseFromCatalog

        public Course getCourseFromCatalog​(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String section)
        Returns the Course from the catalog with the given name and section. Returns null if the Course isnâ€™t in the catalog.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the course
        section - name of the section
        Returns:
        course in the catalog if it exists in the catalog, null of the course does not exist.

      • getCourseCatalog

        public java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()
        Returns the name, section, title, and meeting information for all courses in the catalog.
        Returns:
        2D array of course information the name, section, title, and meeting information

      • saveCourseCatalog

        public void saveCourseCatalog​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Writes the course information from the catalog into a file
        Parameters:
